text: Son Young-ki (, born 30 May 1985) is a South Korean foil fencer. He won several gold medals at the Asian Fencing Championships. During the 2019 World Fencing Championships he won a bronze medal. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male fencers Category:South Korean foil fencers Category:Fencers at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Fencers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for South Korea Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for South Korea Category:Asian Games medalists in fencing Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:World Fencing Championships medalists
title: Son Young-ki
